[Global Namespace]

Global namespace.

Types
HideHUDFlags
enum HideHUDFlags {...}

Flags used in CBasePlayer m_iHideHUD

Values
HIDEHUD_WEAPONS

(1) Hides Weapon Selection Menu and Crosshair elements

HIDEHUD_FLASHLIGHT

(2) Hides the Flashlight element

HIDEHUD_ALL

(4) Hides all HUD elements

HIDEHUD_HEALTH

(8) Hides the Health element

HIDEHUD_WEAPON_SELECT

(16) Hides the Weapon Selection Menu element

HIDEHUD_SUITPOWER

(32) Hides the Battery(armor) element

HIDEHUD_CUSTOM_MAPS

(64) Hides Custom HUD elements from map scripts

HIDEHUD_CUSTOM_PLUGINS

(128) Hides Custom HUD elements from plugins

HIDEHUD_CROSSHAIR

(256) Hides only the Crosshair element

HIDEHUD_AMMO

(512) Hides only the Ammo element
